FuncDef: This command is used to redirect pseudowire packets to an egress port queue-group for the purpose of shaping.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the network policy identification. The value uniquely identifies the policy on the system. Values-1 to 65535.

This optional parameter specifies that the queue-group-name will be used for all egress forwarding class redirections within the network QoS policy ID. The specified queue-group-name must exist as a port egress queue group on the port associated with the IP interface.
Specifies the identification of a specific instance of the queue-group. Values-1 to 16384.
